Most of the time, we are also talking about memory forensics

KAPE is a live data acquisition and analysis tool which can be used to acquire registry data.

Autopsy gives the possibility to acquire data from both live systems or from a disk image. It works with data sources.

FTK Imager also similar to Autopsy and allows you to extract data
